station.name: Ballinrobe Community Radio
station.longDesc: The aim of the radio station is to give the community a platform where they can share their voices. The station plans to improve access to local information and community events and to ensure that there is a sense of connectedness in our community between people of all ages, culture and ethics backgrounds. Our goal is to get behind local musicians, become a sustainable business, provide media training and ensure that we become a stronghold for the community by bringing  people from all backgrounds together.

station.name: Community Radio Youghal
station.longDesc: Community Radio Youghal is a Community Radio Station that broadcasts to Youghal Town and the surrounding areas of East Cork and West Waterford on 104FM. We broadcast 7 days a week, 52 weeks a year. Our programming includes Current Affairs, Sport, Inclusiveness, the Arts, Women's Issues, Local History and Specialist Music.

station.name: Wired FM
station.longDesc: Wired FM is dedicated to the student community of Limerick. All its DJ's are student volunteers and it is run as a partner ship between Limerick Institute of Technology, The LImerick School of Art and Design, and Mary Immaculate College, University of Limerick. We are always open to new ideas for programmes and volunteers are always welcome to get involved.

station.name: TCR FM
station.longDesc: Broadcasting from studios on Queen Street, TCR FM is Tramore's Community Radio Station. They aim to inform, educate and entertain. TCR FM provides a wide variety of programming including local news and event information, specialist music and special interest programmes.

station.name: Breeze AM
station.longDesc: Breeze FM is an internet radio station from Dublin, Ireland, providing Traditional Standards Christmas songs and music. Broadcasting round the clock we have a great mix of quality non stop music sweeps of your favourite love songs.

station.name: Freedom Radio
station.longDesc: Freedom Radio is Rainbow Radio for all the people on the Island of Ireland and elsewhere in the World! Exciting music for your lifestyle, clutter free 24/7 The real sound of a modern 21st century Ireland, available on your Tablet and Computer right now!

station.name: Smash!
station.longDesc: Non-Stop rhythm & dance!

station.name: Radio Limerick Online

station.name: Flirt FM
station.longDesc: Flirt FM 101.3 is the community of interest radio station for Galway city, based in NUI Galway. WeТve been giving students a voice since September 1995. On air weekdays throughout the year, we have a full-time term schedule of 100 hours, and a reduced academic holiday schedule of 60 hours.

station.name: Ballina Killaloe Local Radio
station.longDesc: Streaming from Ballina-Killaloe  where Tipperary meets Clare in the republic of Ireland. Bringing too you,  the latest news and sports news of the area and music from Irish Traditional , American country, Pop and more

station.name: Western Waves Community Radio
station.longDesc: Western Waves FM is a Community Radio Station based in Bundoran, Co. Donegal, Ireland producing special interest content for the western Irish seaboard.

station.name: Event FM
station.longDesc: Event FM is an internet radio station from Dublin, Ireland providing Live shows and Variety music.

station.name: The Foundry FM
station.longDesc: Foundry FM Niteclub Radio The First of its Kind in Ireland!Tune in and listen to live streams from the club or day-time Foundry FM. The FoundryТs play list includes the very best in commercial music and caters to everyoneТs needs. The nightclub has 5 resident D.Js including D.J Michael Byrne, Today FMТs D.J Bob Conway, D.J Matt Givens, D.J Mark Collins and D.J Gerry Cormicken. It has also hosted National D.Js Ray Shah, Mr. Spring and Nicky Hayes.

station.name: Polish Radio Ireland

station.longDesc: Triplag Music created in June 2007 on a base of successful Triplag webradio is a record label and community of artists dedicated to releasing full power night time psychedelic trance music. cTriplag is a full power shamanic web radio and a chill out dub stream. ... Triplag Chillout.

station.name: FRQ.FM
station.longDesc: Ireland's ONLY dedicated Ad free News free Radio Station. (Grab the app for FREE)A brand new type of radio station, because itТs not a УradioФ station.FRQ is a digital only station, with the best new music and brand new talent.

station.name: Owenea FM 100.8
station.longDesc: Located in Ardara, Owenea FM is a community radio station that serves the southwest of Donegal. Its programming focuses mostly on culture, sport, music, arts and local and regional matters.

station.name: YAG FM
station.longDesc: The idea behind the station was to give young people the opportunity to experience the medium of radio be it presenting a show or producing a show or just helping out in the radio studio.

station.name: Christmas FM
station.longDesc: Christmas FM is IrelandТs all Christmas music and holiday music station. The station brings the Magic of Christmas to Ireland on the radio each year and to the world via this website and mobile apps for iOS and Android..

station.name: Halloween FM
station.longDesc: Halloween FM is Irelands' Halloween station, live at HalloweenFM.ie. We're your music Monster for Halloween.

station.name: AGM African Gospel Media
station.longDesc: African Gospel Media Radio is a Christian 24 hour Internet Radio Station. We are Faith based Christian Club. We preached and spread the gospel through music. Hence the wordings of gospel songs are all from the bible and are based on the song writerТs personal experiences with God. Reaching the heart of the people all over the world with the message of Hope, Faith, etc, to those who are suffering from a Broken hearted, Depression, Deceived, Divorce, Mourning, etc that the solution to their challenges in life is in Jesus Christ.
